parameters.name: Propagate
parameters.description: True if the center mark should propagate throughout the pattern, false if not

parameters.name: Slot
parameters.description: True if this is slot-style center mark, false if not

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertCenterMark3
description: Inserts a center mark in a drawing document.
signature:
CenterMark InsertCenterMark3( 
   System.Int32
Style
,
   System.Boolean
Propagate
,
   System.Boolean
Slot
)

parameters.name: Propagate
parameters.description: True if the center mark should propagate throughout the pattern, false if not

parameters.name: Slot
parameters.description: True if this is slot-style center mark, false if not

remarks:
Call
IView::AutoInsertCenterMarks
to automatically insert center marks in multiple drawing views.
